Parameters: Context: This value must never be null.
KeyStoreParameter.Builder(android.conten.Description: Creates a new instance of the Builder with the given context. The context passed in may be used to pop up some UI to ask the user to unlock or initialize the Android KeyStore facility.

Returns: This value will never be null.
setEncryptionRequired(boolean).Description: Sets whether this @B_java#security#KeyStore_E@ entry must be encrypted at rest. Encryption at rest will protect the entry with the secure lock screen credential (e.g., password, PIN, or pattern). Note that enabling this feature requires that the secure lock screen (e.g., password, PIN, pattern) is set up, otherwise setting the KeyStore entry will fail. Moreover, this entry will be deleted when the secure lock screen is disabled or reset (e.g., by the user or a Device Administrator). Finally, this entry cannot be used until the user unlocks the secure lock screen after boot.
setEncryptionRequired(boolean).history: Added in API level 18 Deprecated in API level 23

Returns: built instance of KeyStoreParameter This value will never be null.
Throws: if a required field is missing
